org.jclouds.abiquo

Interface AbiquoContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, ComputeServiceContext, View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbiquoContextImpl

    public interface AbiquoContext
extends ComputeServiceContext
    Abiquo ComputeServiceContext implementation to expose high level Abiquo functionalities.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera

      Returns the administration service.
